item.description:
Every Thursday at 9AM, if not alone and weather permitting, come ascend Pack Monadnock via the Wapack Trail, and descend via the Marion Davis for a 3 mile RT of approx' 3 hours.
A bit of scrambling in the beginning, a couple brief steep paths, but a good climb for beginner to moderate hiker.
Please contact John Bigl if you're able to attend: johnbigl@hotmail.com

Miller State Park:
http://www.nhstateparks.com/miller.html
item.how_to_find_us: Contact John and confirm the meetup location
item.name: Pack Monadnock.. Miller State Park.. Peterborough, NH... Every Thursday...
